not_available.title: DiceThing is not ready yet
not_available.content: I'm working on it, but it's a slow process. Reach out via Github for early access if you like sharp edges.

start.no_saved_sets: You don't have any saved sets... yet ;)

match.preset=go_first: A set of 4d12 that always roll different numbers and have a equal chance of each die being first (and second, third, fourth).
match.preset=scratch: Empty set so you can start from a blank slate
match.preset=classic: The standard 7 D&D dice set with a caltrop D4. Sized around a 14mm D6
match.preset=dicething: My personal picks. A larger than standard set with the shapes that I like (no caltops!)

match.id=crystal_height: Length of the long edge of the body
match.id=crystal_width: Length of the short edge of the body
match.id=crystal_cap: Height of the caps above the long edges of the body
match.id=crystal_twist: Rotation of the the cap with respect to the other faces
match.id=shard_height: Length of the long edge of the body
match.id=shard_cap: Height of the caps above the long edges of the body
match.id=shard_twist: Rotation of the cap with respect to the other faces. 0 is none, 0.5 is exactly half way
match.id=trapezohedron_radius: Distance from the center axis to the edge vertices
